About Me

Up to this day...

I was self-learning about 10 months to aquire skills to start working in web-development company. I think the process of learning never stops and I understand this, I also think that my skills will grow faster when I'll be working on real projects, so hope to join your company soon and work hard to be a real support for the team!

You can always check my github page to see my code. Feel free to comment and of course give me any feedback if you like!

Through my learning process I was working with: Html, Css (Scss/Sass), Javascript, Bootstrap, Styled-components, Node, React, Redux, MobX, Context, Jest, Enzyme, Hooks, Gatsby, GraphQL, Apollo, Next, Express, Firebase, Prisma and many 3rd party addons and libraries.
